trans-unit.source: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery in BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery in BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: Describes business continuity and disaster recovery in <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: Describes business continuity and disaster recovery in <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: It includes the possible issues and the capabilities provided.
trans-unit.target: It includes the possible issues and the capabilities provided.

trans-unit.source: For <token>af_integration_full</token>, Business Continuity issues belong to one of the following categories:
trans-unit.target: For <token>af_integration_full</token>, Business Continuity issues belong to one of the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Failure of individual servers, devices or network connectivity
trans-unit.target: Failure of individual servers, devices or network connectivity

trans-unit.source: Corruption, unwanted modification or deletion of data
trans-unit.target: Corruption, unwanted modification or deletion of data

trans-unit.source: Widespread loss of data center facilities
trans-unit.target: Widespread loss of data center facilities

trans-unit.source: Failure of individual servers, devices or network connectivity
trans-unit.target: Failure of individual servers, devices or network connectivity

trans-unit.source: For these types of failures, <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides some good information, including:
trans-unit.target: For these types of failures, <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides some good information, including:

trans-unit.source: Describes the Fabric Controller (FC); which monitors and manages role instances.
trans-unit.target: Describes the Fabric Controller (FC); which monitors and manages role instances.

trans-unit.source: Tips for developers when creating applications; including storing persistent data in an Azure Store Account or SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Tips for developers when creating applications; including storing persistent data in an Azure Store Account or SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Tips for administrators, including using the Scale feature to handle increase or decrease demands.
trans-unit.target: Tips for administrators, including using the Scale feature to handle increase or decrease demands.

trans-unit.source: To provide high availability, every <token>azure_2</token> BizTalk Service (except the Developer Edition) includes at least two role instances.
trans-unit.target: To provide high availability, every <token>azure_2</token> BizTalk Service (except the Developer Edition) includes at least two role instances.

trans-unit.source: Some Editions can also be scaled to add additional Units.
trans-unit.target: Some Editions can also be scaled to add additional Units.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Developer, Basic, Standard and Premium Editions Chart</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=302279</linkUri></externalLink> for more details.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Developer, Basic, Standard and Premium Editions Chart</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=302279</linkUri></externalLink> for more details.

trans-unit.source: An <token>azure_1</token> BizTalk Service uses <token>ssSDSfull</token>.
trans-unit.target: An <token>azure_1</token> BizTalk Service uses <token>ssSDSfull</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>SQLAzDb</token> has built-in features that provide fault tolerance, as described in <externalLink><linkText>Business Continuity in Azure SQL Database</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh852669.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>SQLAzDb</token> has built-in features that provide fault tolerance, as described in <externalLink><linkText>Business Continuity in Azure SQL Database</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh852669.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Corruption, unwanted modification or deletion of data
trans-unit.target: Corruption, unwanted modification or deletion of data

trans-unit.source: Data corruption, modifications, and deletions can occur for many reasons; including application errors, operator errors, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Data corruption, modifications, and deletions can occur for many reasons; including application errors, operator errors, and so on.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides Backup and Restore functionality.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides Backup and Restore functionality.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to create a backup of the BizTalk Service on a regular basis, including whenever a management operation (like updating the SSL certificate or modifying an EDI agreement) is made to the BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended to create a backup of the BizTalk Service on a regular basis, including whenever a management operation (like updating the SSL certificate or modifying an EDI agreement) is made to the BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> lists the backup and restore options for a BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> lists the backup and restore options for a BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: The Backup-Restore option doesn’t back up the BizTalk Services dependencies, including <token>ssSDSfull</token>s, <token>azure_1</token> Storage, and <token>ac1</token>.
trans-unit.target: The Backup-Restore option doesn’t back up the BizTalk Services dependencies, including <token>ssSDSfull</token>s, <token>azure_1</token> Storage, and <token>ac1</token>.

trans-unit.source: For these dependencies, consider the following:
trans-unit.target: For these dependencies, consider the following:

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Business Continuity in Azure SQL Database</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh852669.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>ssSDSfull</token>.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Business Continuity in Azure SQL Database</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh852669.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>ssSDSfull</token>.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>azure_1</token> Storage.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>azure_1</token> Storage.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to enable geo-replication on the Storage account.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended to enable geo-replication on the Storage account.

trans-unit.source: For <token>ac1</token>, you can create a new namespace.
trans-unit.target: For <token>ac1</token>, you can create a new namespace.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>ac1</token>.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Business Continuity Technical Guidance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309061</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on <token>ac1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Widespread loss of data center facilities
trans-unit.target: Widespread loss of data center facilities

trans-unit.source: When you provision or create a backup of the BizTalk Service, you specify the datacenter.
trans-unit.target: When you provision or create a backup of the BizTalk Service, you specify the datacenter.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to create backups to a different datacenter.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended to create backups to a different datacenter.

trans-unit.source: If a datacenter disaster occurs, use the Restore functionality to restore an existing backup.
trans-unit.target: If a datacenter disaster occurs, use the Restore functionality to restore an existing backup.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> lists the backup and restore options for a BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> lists the backup and restore options for a BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Dashboard</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/support/service-dashboard/</linkUri></externalLink> shows the status of the backend components of the BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Dashboard</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/support/service-dashboard/</linkUri></externalLink> shows the status of the backend components of the BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: Any issues with the backend components are communicated in this dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Any issues with the backend components are communicated in this dashboard.

trans-unit.source: This dashboard also lists the health state of any dependent components.
trans-unit.target: This dashboard also lists the health state of any dependent components.

trans-unit.source: Backup the BizTalk Service often; daily is ideal.
trans-unit.target: Backup the BizTalk Service often; daily is ideal.
